EasyQuest.Name: In Defense of the King's Lands
Hearthstone Goldshire
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Thunderbrew Distillery" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(287) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(412);

EasyQuest.Name: Rhapsody Malt, Crag Boar Rib, Chunk of Boar Meat
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Rhapsody Malt") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Crag Boar Rib") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Chunk of Boar Meat");

QuestClass.Code:
wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Remove("Thunder Ale");
return true;

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Thunderbrew Distillery" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(287) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(412) || !Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Kharanos") && !Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Thunderbrew Distillery");

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Stoutlager Inn" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(416) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(418) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Thelsamar");

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 3
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Auberdine" || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Auberdine") || Usefuls.ContinentId != (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor;

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Loch Modan
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Stoutlager Inn" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(416) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(418);

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Auberdine
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Auberdine" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1001) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(955);

EasyQuest.Name: Spider Ichor, Bear Meat, Boar Intestines
Catch Ship Darkshore
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Azeroth && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(109) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(64) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(38) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(151) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(9) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(22) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(153) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(12) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(102);

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Stormwind
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1001) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(955) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(4761) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(4681) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(984);

QuestClass.Code:
wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Remove("Linen Cloth");
return true;

EasyQuest.Name: Tram to SW
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1338) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Stormwind City" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Elwynn Forest" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Westfall" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Duskwood" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Redridge Mountains";

EasyQuest.Name: Tram to SW Warlock
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1689) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Stormwind City" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Elwynn Forest" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Westfall" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Duskwood" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Redridge Mountains" || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Warlock;
